group_1.narration: In the season when snow turns to rain...@I was invited by Maria.
Hagumu,@are you available on this holiday?
Why don't we invite Moka too, and the three of us@can have tea together? I found a shop@that has delicious cakes.
And, I have a small favor to ask you...

group_1.textRight: Wow... Cute cakes...@[chara:303401:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:303401:cheek_0][chara:303401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:303401:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy][chara:303401:lipSynch_1]They're really delicious too~!

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*@I'm glad you like them.

group_1.textCenter: (I'm glad I was invited but...@It's a little awkward...)
(Both of them are in the Kamihama Magia Union,@but I'm the only one who isn't...)

group_1.textRight: Hagumu's macaron cake looks so cute.
...Hagumu?@Did you not like the cake?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, y-yes!@It's delicious...!
(It seems that both of them don't mind.)
(...It's not nice of me to feel uncomfortable around@them...[wait:1][chara:103001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json] R-right!)
Moka...@Would you like to try a little?

group_1.textRight: Can I...?@[chara:303401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:303401:cheek_0][chara:303401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:303401:lipSynch_1]Thank you!
[chara:303401:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Mmmm~@This cake's delicious too!
*Chuckle*
Well...@Then, let me get to the point.

group_1.textLeft: A favor, was it?

group_1.textRight: Yes.
I've been working part-time at an after-school care@program... I talked about this before, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I heard.

group_1.textRight: Along with this upcoming Hinamatsuri, that after-school care program is...
...going to do the "Hina-no-kuni-mise".

group_1.textLeft: Hina-no...

group_1.textRight: ...kuni-mise...?

group_1.narration: "When the weather is nice,@you bring Hina dolls and sweets outside,@and show Ohina-sama the beautiful scenery.@They say it was a common practice@during the Edo period."

group_1.textLeft: Oh... I didn't know there was a traditional event@like that.

group_1.textRight: Sounds like fun...@Ohina-sama will surely love it.
Seems interesting, right?
So we've been talking about doing this in the@nearby park, but...
We have a problem in that Ohina-sama's a bit@expensive these days...

group_1.textLeft: It'd definitely be terrible if they break...

group_1.textRight: So, can I ask you for a favor, Hagumu...?@[chara:303601:cheek_0][chara:303601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]Could you make Hina dolls for us?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Eh?! M-me...?!
I couldn't possibly make something as amazing as@Hina dolls...!

group_1.textRight: Would it be too difficult to make with cloth or felt@like the dolls you showed me before?

group_1.textLeft: Eh...?@Is it fine with something like that?

group_1.textRight: Or rather, that's the way I'd like them, so that@we can take them outside.

group_1.textLeft: If that's so, I can probably do it...
Cloth and felt...@Hmm... It might be better with woolen yarn...
...Oh!@Can I go with needle felting?

group_1.textRight: The one where you prick things with a needle?@Yeah, I'm sure the children will love it.

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, but are you really sure you're okay@with me doing it...?

group_1.textRight: Hagumu, you're the only person I could ask.

group_1.textLeft: I am...?

group_1.textRight: You've been making every single costume with@great care for the drama club, right?
So, you see? That's why I want to ask for@Hagumu's help.

group_1.textLeft: Well... I'll do my best!

group_1.textRight: Thank you.

group_1.textLeft: Can I do anything for you...?

group_1.textRight: As for Moka...
I wanted to hear your ideas for Hinamatsuri sweets.

group_1.textLeft: Hinamatsuri sweets...
I'll do my best to come up with something that can@make the children happy...!

group_1.textCenter: (I'm the only one that can do this...)
